description:
Holmes and the others find out the truth and try to warn J, but Hikari manages to steal the pendant and broch. The distortion in the space-time continues to get worse, and a huge hole appears in the sky. J does everything he can to get the pendant back from Hikari. Once they finally stopped, they found Mikuni waiting for them. Mikuni then tells them that it’s about time to depart.
Source: crunchyroll
